user_story: As a user i want to be able to read news about transfer of player so I know which player changed to which team
AS a enduser, i want to have a dispaly option at where i can see the total value of my current portfolio so that i have a complete overview over my finacial situation.
As a user I want to search for games or clubs to find the clubs of my choice quickly
As a user I want to add ingredients to a shopping list so that it is easier for me to go shopping and buy everything I need for the cooking.
AS a enduser, i want to have an add coin button, to add new coins to my portfolio.
As a user, I want to see a picture of the food so that I can imagine what it will look like and judge whether I would like it.
As a user, I want to be able to save a particular meal for later, so that I don't have to search for it again and can just find it on my favourites page.
As a user I want to see the games of yesterday and tomorrow to anticipate future games and see the history of games of my clubs
As a user I want to know how long it will take me to cook the selected meal so that I can integrate it in my current week.
As a student, I want to access the lesson again so that I can see what mistakes I made.
As a sport app user, I want to see which football games are on today so that I dont miss out on my favorite teams.
I want to have a star icon on the product card, the remeber my store my favorite products
i want to have a category section, where i can browse different shopping options.
As a sport app user, I want to see which football leagues have games on today so that I dont miss out on my favorite leagues.
As a student, I want to select the next lesson so that I can continue learning.

AS a enduser, i want to have a dispaly option at where i can see the toal changes in value over the last 24 hours, so that i can observe if i have lost or made moeny. it is supposed to help me ti reavlaute my purchasing descisions.
As a user I want to read the football news to be informed about the newest developments in the football world
As an enduser, i want to be able to make alerts for different coin types, so i am always informed at all time if there is a change happening.
As a user, I want to be able to go back so that I can always return and continue my previous search.
As a veterinarian, I want to follow different dogs so that I can see if they show signs of illness.
AS a enduser, i want to have a dispaly option where i can observe the price and price chnages of differnet coins types, to habe additional information for my investment decisons.
